title: JWT Authentication and Authorization in Node.js
description: Learn how to implement authentication and role-based authorization using JWT in Node.js applications for secure and scalable systems.
courseOverview: This course will teach you the fundamentals of implementing secure authentication with JWT tokens in a Node.js environment. You will cover the creation of secure login systems, handling of user roles, and implementing authorization for various user permissions using JWT.
willLearn: How JWT works for authentication and authorization
Set up JWT authentication with Node.js and Express
Secure API routes using JWT and role-based access control
Refresh tokens and handle session expiration
skills: Secure REST API endpoints with JWT
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of Node.js and Express
Familiarity with REST APIs and HTTP methods

sections.title: Introduction to JWT Authentication
sections.firstMessage: In this section, we will explore what JWT is and set up a basic Node.js project with JWT authentication.

lessons.title: What is JWT and How Does It Work?
Setting Up a Node.js Project with JWT

sections.title: Creating User Registration and Login System
sections.firstMessage: In this section, we’ll build the user registration and login system, generating JWT tokens upon successful login.

sections.title: Securing Routes with JWT Authentication
sections.firstMessage: Now, we will secure specific API routes using JWT to ensure that only authorized users can access them.

lessons.title: Creating JWT Middleware to Secure Routes
Securing Private Routes with JWT Validation

sections.title: Role-Based Authorization with JWT
sections.firstMessage: In this section, we’ll implement role-based access control (RBAC) using JWT to restrict access to certain parts of the application based on user roles.

lessons.title: Securing Routes with Role-Based Access Control
Checking User Roles in JWT Payload

sections.title: JWT Refresh Tokens and Session Management
sections.firstMessage: Learn how to manage user sessions with refresh tokens, extending session validity while maintaining security.

lessons.title: Implementing Refresh Tokens for Session Extension

sections.title: Testing JWT Authentication and Authorization
sections.firstMessage: Finally, learn how to test the authentication and authorization system to ensure everything works as expected.
